mapper.insert: insert into accountbook (ab_at_num, ab_pp_num, ab_pt_num, ab_me_id, ab_date, ab_amount, ab_detail, ab_regularity, ab_period) values (#{ab.ab_at_num},#{ab.ab_pp_num},#{ab.ab_pt_num},#{ab.ab_me_id},#{ab.ab_date},#{ab.ab_amount},#{ab.ab_detail},#{ab.ab_regularity},#{ab.ab_period})
mapper.select: select * from accountbook where ab_me_id = #{user.me_id} and ab_date like concat(#{date},'%')
select * from accountbook where ab_me_id = #{me_id} and ab_at_num = #{isIncome} and ab_date >= #{searchBegin} and #{searchEnd} >= ab_date;

SELECT ab_date as date, SUM(CASE WHEN ab_at_num = 1 THEN ab_amount ELSE 0 END) AS totalIncome, SUM(CASE WHEN ab_at_num = 2 THEN ab_amount ELSE 0 END) AS totalExpense FROM accountbook WHERE ab_me_id = #{me_id} and ab_date like concat(#{date},'%') GROUP BY ab_date;
mapper.delete: delete from accountbook where ab_me_id = #{me_id} and ab_num = #{ab_num}
mapper.select: select * from accountbook where ab_me_id = #{me_id} and ab_num = #{ab_num}
mapper.update: update accountbook set ab_at_num = #{ab.ab_at_num}, ab_pp_num = #{ab.ab_pp_num}, ab_pt_num = #{ab.ab_pt_num}, ab_me_id = #{ab.ab_me_id}, ab_date = #{ab.ab_date}, ab_amount = #{ab.ab_amount}, ab_detail = #{ab.ab_detail}, ab_regularity = #{ab.ab_regularity}, ab_period = #{ab.ab_period} where ab_num = #{ab.ab_num}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM accountbook WHERE ab_me_id = #{me_id} and ab_regularity != 0
